Text: Texas MBAThank you for taking the time to meet with me on such short notice I am really looking forward to hearing about your MBA experience at UT I have taken the liberty of attaching my resume for your review I look forward to meeting you this afternoon Connie Lee Enron Broadband Services W C

RE Connie Lee Admission Visits Cc Im looking forward to meeting you on Friday during the information session Just to give you an update I met with a Texas MBA contact Charlie Weldon aka Charles V Weldon today The visit went well and I learned a lot about the MBA program at McCombs Charlie was uncertain as to what the next steps are in terms of providing feedback to the Admissions Committee It would be great if you could pass on the necessary evaluation forms deadlines etc that he will need in order to provide feedback to the Admissions Committee Charlies contact information is as follows w f email Please feel free to contact me should you need any additional information Again thank you for your time and I look forward to visiting with you on Friday Sincerely Connie Lee Enron Broadband Services W C PM To Connie LeeEnron nron Communications cc Subject RE Connie Lee Admission Visits Dear Connie I will be conducting the information session on Friday so I will be around to answer any questions that you may have Do you have Charles email address I will be happy to pass on the information that he needs to him We look forward to your visit Julia Original Message From mailto Sent Monday April PM To Julia Hafener Subject RE Connie Lee Admission Visits Julia Thank you for the quick response I tried this morning and the information was not in the system yet However when I tried this afternoon I was able to find a contact I am going to be talking to Charles Weldon MBA at one point this week This is the first interview Charles will be performing and he was curious as to what he needed to provide to the Admissions office Do I need to bring him an evaluation form etc Also I plan to come down for the campus tour and information session on Friday of this week April I believe that it begins at pm I would love to stop by and visit with you if you have time Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you soon Connie Lee Enron Broadband Services W C us utexasedu PM To Connie LeeEnron nron Communications cc Subject RE Connie Lee Admission Visits Dear Connie I just tried logging on as you and I was able to do it Why dont you try again and let me know if you have any problems Julia Julia Hafener and Sean P Maloney Texas Admissions Committee Directors McCombs Graduate School of Business University of Texas at Austin Original Message From mailto Sent Monday April AM To AdmissionVisits Subject Connie Lee Admission Visits Re Application for Connie Nita Lee to the MBA Program at the McCombs School of Business To Whom It May Concern I submitted an application through Embark for the MBA Program at the McCombs School of Business on Saturday April I have been looking forward to scheduling an offcampus interview with a UT Alumnus However I am having difficulty signing up for an interview online I have been entering the following information birthdate student ID Since the deadline for offcampus interviews is May you can probably understand my concern for getting an interview scheduled The people in the admissions office were kind enough to check on the status of my application however it appears that my application has still not downloaded into the UT system Can you please inform me of an alternate way to schedule an offcampus interview so that I may talk to someone prior to the May deadline Thank you so much for your consideration in the above matter I look forward to hearing from you soon Sincerely Connie Lee Enron Broadband Services W C atthtm
